title: Washington State Tightens Oversight on Crypto Kiosks
description: Washington State is strengthening its regulations for the growing and sometimes disputed field of cryptocurrency kiosks. You may also know them as Bitcoin ATMs, and today, you will often see them at gas stations, convenience stores, or in urban neighborhoods for the quick purchase or selling of digital currencies.  Yet because it is very easy […]

title: Bitcoin hits a record high of $110,000, BTC whales use PaladinMining to bid farewell to traditional hardware mining and earn $3,000 a day

title: Microsoft's crypto payment gateway, bridging traditional and digital finance
description: Now that digital currencies are becoming more popular, Microsoft has introduced its Crypto Payment Gateway. It was created to let merchants use crypto while benefiting from the protection, stability, and ease of use that standard finance offers. The gateway connects decentralized finance with advanced enterprise systems, showing how businesses and consumers are starting to transact online differently. The more digital currencies are used online, the more interest is growing in the shiba inu coin and alternative crypto coins to Bitcoin and Ethereum. If this payment gateway is adopted, people may...
